issue.title: Define number of results per page in catalog/context instead of global param
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Is easySDI CATALOG, we'd like be able to define number of results per page in every catalog/context instead of global parameter.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Drop off global param, add param to each catalog (context) and set a default value of such param when editing catalog's context.

Accepted by everyone...
